not-found.title: Page Not Found
not-found.description: Sorry, we couldn't find the page you were looking for. It might have been moved or no longer exists.
not-found.contact-prefix: If you believe this is an error, please

global-error.title: An error has occurred - v0 App
global-error.description: We apologize for the inconvenience. A system error has occurred and we are working to fix it.
global-error.support: If the issue persists, please contact us

login.title: Log in to the system
login.description: Welcome back! Log in to access the Dashboard

password.min: Password must be at least 6 characters
password.max: Password must be at most 16 characters

messages.login-failed: Login failed, please check your credentials
messages.logout-failed: Logout failed, please try again later

users.title: User Management
